DeskMonday: ^School... Why do you always give me problems.
^Someone talked to me... And asked me to hang out with them.
^But not just that. It was a woman.
^And who the heck is Hayashida Kazuhiko? Why so specific?
^Maybe she only spoke to me because of the curse... That's has to be it!
^I think if I just avoid her, I won't have to deal with her.
